name: Tiny Alien - Jump and Shoot!
description:
Jump and shoot your way through space!
Can you defeat the evil empire and bring back the sacred gems?
You are our only hope T I N Y A L I E N !

* Fast paced arcade platforming action!
* Sweet pixel graphics!
* Music by Boy vs Bacteria!
* Power-ups!
* Bosses!
* Unlock different characters!
* Haptic Feedback on supported devices!
* Game Center Leaderboards & Achievements!

Good Luck!
